item.title: About
item.description: Writing is nature’s way of letting you know how sloppy your thinking is. Dick Guindon (discovered via “Why We Should Build Software Like We Build Houses”)

item.title: Some tools I use for focussed work
item.description: Before Covid-19 happened, I was reading a lot around the topics of focus, attention and, concentration. With so many working from home and adjusting to a home office in a house full of people, I thought it timely to post a list of stuff I’ve been using over the past years. Currently, I depend on the following to stay productive. Wall of Noise In an open office environment, or working from a home with family in it, I need to put something between myself and potential distractions.
